statements: INSERT INTO MeetingRoles (role_name, role_description) VALUES ('Chairperson', 'Leads and facilitates the meeting');
INSERT INTO MeetingRoles (role_name, role_description) VALUES ('Secretary', 'Takes notes and records meeting minutes');
INSERT INTO MeetingRoles (role_name, role_description) VALUES ('Treasurer', 'Manages financial matters of the meeting');
INSERT INTO MeetingRoles (role_name, role_description) VALUES ('Host', 'Arranges and coordinates meeting logistics');
INSERT INTO MeetingRoles (role_name, role_description) VALUES ('Facilitator', 'Guides and manages group discussions during the meeting');
INSERT INTO MeetingRoles (role_name, role_description) VALUES ('Facilitator', 'Leads the meetings and ensures smooth proceedings');

INSERT INTO MeetingRoles (role_name, role_description) VALUES ('Timekeeper', 'Monitors time and keeps track of meeting schedule');
